review.comment: They got a technician to my house less than 4 hours after I called! Gilbert called to let me know he would be to my house soon and showed up as promised. He quickly diagnosed the issue and repaired it professionally and quickly. I can’t ask for better service and will certainly use them for all of my HVAC needs!
Excellent service.  Reasonable price.   Professional service technicians
review.review_reply: Thank you so much the 5-star rating and review, Larry.  We strive to be the best!

review.comment:
TJ, Linda, and the technicians were all very professional and did outstanding work at my place. They replaced my furnace and installed new AC, both of which run beautifully now. At one point during installation they ran into a major leak beneath my condo that required gaining access into a neighbors garage (I live in a condo) and while it presented a big problem, the technicians carefully and methodically diagnosed the problem and replaced the faulty copper piping caused by the previous builders.

Will definitely be using Air X-treme in the future!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for the 5-star rating and great review!  We agree that our staff are the best!  We are so glad we could solve your Heating and Cooling problems and look forward to  helping you in the future.

review.comment: They called me back and told me and told me what it was gonna cost cost before they came out and I waited till 8 o'clock and they still came out called before they came and made all the repairs I would use them again
review.review_reply: Terry, thanks very much for the 5 stars and kind words!

review.comment: They did an awesome job, they showed before pictures on how dirty the furnace was,  I had no idea
review.review_reply: Mike, thank you for the 5 star rating. We're glad that your experience with us was so positive. We are constantly striving to be the best!
Thanks for the great rating on Google, Arturo! We appreciate your feedback.
Hi Erik! Thanks so much for the great review.

review.comment: Chuck was very professional and the job was quickly done
review.review_reply: Thank you, Daniel, for sharing this great review and the shout-out to Chuck. We appreciate it and agree that Chuck does an excellent job!

review.comment:
Recently we suspected a gas leak at our home at 10 pm. Atmos energy confirmed the leak and gave us Air X-Treme's number.

I called them first thing in the morning (on a Friday) and they had a crew at our house in about 45 minutes. They spent all day fixing our gas leaks and kept us apprised at each step. They always checked with us and gave us an estimate as well as our options before performing any service.

Aaron and Charles were very pleasant and professional and--check this out--after receiving our bill, Linda emailed me to point out an addition mistake on their part that saved us over $100. I mean, who does that??

Air X-Treme is our go-to team. Give them a try. You'll be glad you did.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the high praise, Jeff. We are lucky to have such great customers like you! Thank you for your business.

review.comment: Great service.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the 5-star rating, Tailor.

review.comment: Fast and honest service.  I've used them for years for all my hvac needs on several properties.  Linda, TJ, and the technicians are always friendly and easy to work with.
review.review_reply: Thanks for the great rating on Google, Tim! We appreciate your feedback.

review.comment: I am really satisfied with the service I got from Air Extreme. They installed central air conditioning and heating in my old house. I paid a lot less than I would have with a larger co. They completed the entire job, including electrical and ducting in two days. I would recommend this company.
review.review_reply: We're happy that you are happy with our services, bck. Thank you for your feedback.

review.comment: The best in Greeley
review.review_reply: Thank you for taking the time to review us, Gilbert We really appreciate it.

review.comment: I bought a heater and  central air had it installed.  First the central air cooling unit was put in my dog run where my dogs ruined it freeing the freeon. They peed on  the fins making them for away.  No warning about it.   Then when I look to get it replaced every company has said it was to big for the space I have and the coil was not matched to heating unit.  Basically not enough supply air for the coil.   So I need to replace it all.   Talked to air Xtreme and basically got a don't care additude and another quote to replace at 3/4 of the cost for both a/c and heater.

review.review_reply: Tj Folkers, thank you for the GREAT rating!

review.comment: Very bad communication skills. They need to get better evaluation equipment just as well. From $750 evaluation & repair to $156 from a different company. While they took one month and a half for them to come back a second time,  I had A-1 Heating & Cooling Company come out on the same day and fix the problem in 10 minutes for $156. Big difference!
I have not used them but speaking with them they were very knowledgeable.

I recently used this company for an air conditioning repair and got service that in the end did not leave me feeling comfortable by the time all was said and done.  I had a technician come out to look at my air conditioning problem and he thought that it might be the fan and was unsure.  He stated he was going to order one and install it if the problem persisted, but he was not 100% sure that was the problem.  The technician ended up stating that he was told by the owner that this was the issue without question and installed it.  This was not the case.  After the repair my system was left with the same problem hours after the technician left only to be told he would be out to check it in the morning and to turn the unit off until then.  I informed the technician that I had a small window in the morning and the technician stated that he would be able to do whatever it was he needed to.  The technician showed up with 20 minutes to spare before knowing that I needed to leave for an appointment and within a couple minutes topped off my refrigerant and the system was immediately working fine and has since.  It is odd to me that this fix was so apparent and immediately fixed this problem after a $400.00 repair that prior day and was not something that was checked the prior day before any expensive repairs were made.  I emailed the owner and feel I as though it fell on deaf ears and got nowhere with my concern.  Being as though I am not a HVAC repair person I consulted a couple other companies who stated a similar course of action collectively that was different than this company used.  I am just sharing my experience and you so that you can use this in your decision making when you need to.

In addition to what happened above I had Airxtreme out for a repair on my A/C as my usual company was booked.  They completed the repair and when I went to pay I was surprised with an additional fee.  I went to pay by credit card and was told that there was an additional 3.25% as that is what the credit card company charges them and this was a convenience to me.  This was never mentioned at the time of scheduling and when I called and voiced my opinion I was told that they normally have this on their work orders.  I told her that I did not get a work order until I paid and that obviously not help as again this is after the fact.  I won't do business with them in the future.
Great service and a fair price.

These guys got out to our house when our A/C was on the fritz and it was 98 outside so fast. We had just bought our house a few months prior and the unit was installed less than a year ago. They came out, made a few minor tweaks for us and told us they would still keep the warranty for us even though the previous home owner left us no info.
We highly recommend them and will continue to use them!
Great service!   Our air conditioner went out last night,  called this morning and it was up and running by noon the same day! Thank you so much Cody! I will definitely call again if we need service!

This company is the most GENEROUS company I have ever seen! Their giveaways BLOW ME AWAY! If I lived closer to them, I would go to their office and personally meet all of the staff and owners! I would also have them service my home, wherever that would be!!I highly recommend this company to anyone and everyone who needs their services! YOU GUYS ROCK!!  THANK YOU!!!
Our furnace stopped working on a cold Saturday.  These folks came out within a few hours and quickly and efficiently repaired it.  Highly recommend these people.
